briefTitle: Treatment Study Using Depot Naltrexone (1/6) Philadelphia Coord/Data Mgmt Site

outcomeMeasures.title: Relapse
outcomeMeasures.description: A relapse event was defined as 10 or more days of opioid use in a 28-day (4-week) period as assessed by self-report or by testing of urine samples obtained every 2 weeks; a positive or missing sample was computed as 5 days of opioid use.
